comments.body: Please add a TODO to distinguish different conditions (Reachable, Live) based on the type of error.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +85,89 @@	switch status, err := r.client.HealthCheck(node.Name); {
	case err != nil:
		condition = api.ConditionUnknown
	case status == health.Unhealthy:
		condition = api.ConditionNone
